verses.text: Then all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* was gathered \w together|strong="H6950"\w* as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, from \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* even to \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w*, with the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w*.

And the \w chief|strong="H6438"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add even\add* of all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w presented|strong="H3320"\w* themselves in the \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w footmen|strong="H0376"\w* that \w drew|strong="H8025"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

(Now the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w*.) Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \add us\add*, how \w was|strong="H1961"\w* this \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*?

And the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, the \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* that was \w slain|strong="H7523"\w*, \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* that \add belongeth\add* to \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, I and my \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w*, to \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w*.\f + \fr 20.4 \ft the Levite: Heb. the man the Levite\f*

And the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* against me, and \w beset|strong="H5437"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* round \w about|strong="H5437"\w* upon me by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \add and\add* \w thought|strong="H1819"\w* to have \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* me: and my \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w* have they \w forced|strong="H6031"\w*, that she is \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 20.5 \ft forced: Heb. humbled\f*

And I \w took|strong="H0270"\w* my \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w*, and cut her in \w pieces|strong="H5408"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* her throughout all the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: for they have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w* and \w folly|strong="H5039"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Behold, ye \add are\add* all \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w give|strong="H3051"\w* \w here|strong="H1988"\w* your \w advice|strong="H1697"\w* and \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*.

¶ And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, We will not \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \add of us\add* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, neither will we \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \add of us\add* \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* into his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.
But now this \add shall be\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* which we will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*; \add we will go up\add* by \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* against it;

And we will \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* throughout all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* of a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* out of ten \w thousand|strong="H7233"\w*, to \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* \w victual|strong="H6720"\w* for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that they may \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, when they \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Gibeah|strong="H1387"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, according to all the \w folly|strong="H5039"\w* that they have \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

So all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* against the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, knit \w together|strong="H2270"\w* as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 20.11 \ft knit…: Heb. fellows\f*

¶ And the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* through all the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \add is\add* this that is \w done|strong="H1961"\w* among you?

Now therefore \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \add us\add* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w*, which \add are\add* in \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, that we may put them to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, and put \w away|strong="H1197"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. But the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

But the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H0622"\w* out of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* unto \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, to go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* at that \w time|strong="H3117"\w* out of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* that \w drew|strong="H8025"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, beside the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, which were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

Among all this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add there were\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w lefthanded|strong="H0334"\w*; every one could \w sling|strong="H7049"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* at an \w hair|strong="H8185"\w* \add breadth\add*, and not \w miss|strong="H2398"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, beside \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* that \w drew|strong="H8025"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: all these \add were\add* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* counsel of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Which|strong="H4310"\w* of us shall go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w first|strong="H8462"\w* to the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*? And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add shall go up\add* \w first|strong="H8462"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* against \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* against \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*; and the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* put themselves in \w array|strong="H6186"\w* to \w fight|strong="H4421"\w* against them at \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, and destroyed \w down|strong="H7843"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w encouraged|strong="H2388"\w* themselves, and set their \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* in \w array|strong="H6186"\w* in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where they put themselves in \w array|strong="H6186"\w* the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

(And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* until \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, and \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* counsel of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Shall I go \w up|strong="H5066"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* my \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*? And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against him.)

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* came \w near|strong="H7126"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* them out of \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and destroyed \w down|strong="H7843"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* again \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*; all these \w drew|strong="H8025"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

¶ Then all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, and \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* there \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* until \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, and \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* and peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, (for the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add was\add* there in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*,

And \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* it in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*,) \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Shall I yet \w again|strong="H3254"\w* go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* my \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, or shall I \w cease|strong="H2308"\w*? And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; for to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.
And \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* liers in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and put themselves in \w array|strong="H6186"\w* against \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, as at other \w times|strong="H6471"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add and\add* were drawn \w away|strong="H5423"\w* from the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; and they \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add and\add* \w kill|strong="H2491"\w*, as at other \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, in the \w highways|strong="H4546"\w*, of which \w one|strong="H0259"\w* goeth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* to \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, about \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 20.31 \ft to smite…: Heb. to smite of the people wounded as at, etc\f*\f + \fr 20.31 \ft the house…: or, Beth-el\f*

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, They \add are\add* smitten \w down|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us, as at the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*. But the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*, and \w draw|strong="H5423"\w* them from the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* unto the \w highways|strong="H4546"\w*.

And all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* out of their \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and put themselves in \w array|strong="H6186"\w* at \w Baal-tamar|strong="H1193"\w*: and the liers in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* came \w forth|strong="H1518"\w* out of their \w places|strong="H4725"\w*, \add even\add* out of the \w meadows|strong="H4629"\w* of \w Gibeah|strong="H1387"\w*.

And there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w against|strong="H5048"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* out of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* was \w sore|strong="H3513"\w*: but they \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not that \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add was\add* \w near|strong="H5060"\w* them.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w smote|strong="H5062"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* of the \w Benjamites|strong="H1145"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*: all these \w drew|strong="H8025"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

So the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that they were \w smitten|strong="H5062"\w*: for the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* to the \w Benjamites|strong="H1145"\w*, because they \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* unto the liers in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* which they had \w set|strong="H7760"\w* beside \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*.

And the liers in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* \w hasted|strong="H2363"\w*, and \w rushed|strong="H6584"\w* upon \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*; and the liers in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* drew \add themselves\add* \w along|strong="H4900"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* all the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.\f + \fr 20.37 \ft drew…: or, made a long sound with the trumpet\f*

Now there was an appointed \w sign|strong="H4150"\w* between the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H5973"\w* the liers in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w*, that they should make a \w great|strong="H7235"\w* \w flame|strong="H4864"\w* with \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* rise \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 20.38 \ft sign: or, time\f*\f + \fr 20.38 \ft and: Heb. with\f*\f + \fr 20.38 \ft flame: Heb. elevation\f*

And when the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w retired|strong="H2015"\w* in the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \add and\add* \w kill|strong="H2491"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* about \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w persons|strong="H0376"\w*: for they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Surely|strong="H5062"\w* they are smitten \w down|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us, as \add in\add* the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 20.39 \ft to smite…: Heb. to smite the wounded\f*

But when the \w flame|strong="H4864"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to arise \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* with a \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w*, the \w Benjamites|strong="H1145"\w* \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* them, and, behold, the \w flame|strong="H3632"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* ascended \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.\f + \fr 20.40 \ft the flame of: Heb. the whole consumption of\f*

And when the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* turned \w again|strong="H2015"\w*, the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* were \w amazed|strong="H0926"\w*: for they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* was \w come|strong="H5060"\w* upon them.\f + \fr 20.41 \ft was come…: Heb. touched them\f*

Therefore they \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \add their backs\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*; but the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w overtook|strong="H1692"\w* them; and them which \add came\add* out of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* they \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of them.

\add Thus\add* they \w inclosed|strong="H3803"\w* the \w Benjamites|strong="H1145"\w* round \w about|strong="H3803"\w*, \add and\add* \w chased|strong="H7291"\w* them, \add and\add* trode them \w down|strong="H1869"\w* with \w ease|strong="H4496"\w* over \w against|strong="H5227"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* toward the \w sunrising|strong="H4217"\w*.\f + \fr 20.43 \ft with ease…: or, from Menuchah, etc\f*\f + \fr 20.43 \ft over…: Heb. unto over against\f*

And there \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*; all these \add were\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*.

And they \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* and \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* toward the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* unto the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* of \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w*: and they \w gleaned|strong="H5953"\w* of them in the \w highways|strong="H4546"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*; and \w pursued|strong="H1692"\w* hard \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them unto \w Gidom|strong="H1440"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of them.

So that all which \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* were \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* that \w drew|strong="H8025"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; all these \add were\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*.

But \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* and \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* to the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* unto the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w*, and \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* turned \w again|strong="H7725"\w* upon the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, as well the \w men|strong="H4974"\w* of \add every\add* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* the \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, and all that came to \w hand|strong="H4672"\w*: also they \w set|strong="H7971"\w* on \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* that they came \w to|strong="H4672"\w*.\f + \fr 20.48 \ft came to hand: Heb. was found\f*\f + \fr 20.48 \ft they came…: Heb. were found\f*
